alert.note: Alert for Garfield; Grant; Kay; Noble (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 4:03AM CDT until June 10 at 4:45AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM CDT FOR KAY...NORTHERN NOBLE...SOUTHEASTERN GRANT AND NORTHEASTERN GARFIELD COUNTIES... At 403 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southwest of Kaw City to 4 miles south of Lamont, moving south at 35 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...The Blackwell Mesonet measured a 70 mph wind gust. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Ponca City, Blackwell, Tonkawa, Medford, Newkirk, Garber, Billings, Lamont, Kaw City, Red Rock, Breckenridge, Marland, Braman, Hunter, Fairmont, Deer Creek, Kildare, Chilocco, Kaw Lake and Hardy. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
